author: Staff Reporter
text:
Four men, including a contractor and an advocate, were arrested by Madurai city police for allegedly attempting to murder three youngsters near Pykara here on Wednesday night.

The contractor, Solairaja (31), residing in Bharathiar Street in Palanganatham, had enmity with G. Anil Karthik (21), a BBA student from TVS Nagar. Solairaja and six of his friends, including advocate Karthik, allegedly waylaid and attacked Anil and two of his friends, who were walking along TPK Road near Pykara, with knives. The three youths, who sustained grievous injuries, were taken to Government Rajaji Hospital. Based on a complaint by Anil, an attempt-to-murder case was registered against Solairaja and his friends at Subramaniapuram police station.

Later, Solairaja, Karthik, Dinesh Kumar and Kali (a) Kalidas were arrested by the police and weapons and vehicles used by them were seized.
title: Four arrested
